Package gui.UserManagementScreens

Class AddSubscriberScreenController

java.lang.Object
gui.ScreenController
gui.UserManagementScreens.AddSubscriberScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddSubscriberScreenController extends ScreenController implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
AddSubscriberScreenController class provides the functionality of the Add subscriber screen. this class is responsible for displaying all the customers in the system and allows the user to change their status to subscriber or not a subscriber.
Author:
Lior
